name: momatron
description:
Tower Defense
This is a Tower Defense game, in which you will fight against enemies with Towers, Bombs, Rollers and Drones.
You will start with only two Towers and simple Bombs, in each next Level you will get more weapons.




Big Bomb
This big glowing ball that the enemies try to push forward is the Big Bomb, it is important that this Big Bomb never reaches your Defense Tower, otherwise... you know.




Gameplay
Gameplay is simple, destroy Enemies and try to destroy Big Bomb as many times as possible, because this is your Mana Source.
Game has 14 levels in which the gameplay time is between 10 and 60 minutes.




Demo
There is a demo version of the game, please try it before you spend the money and buy the game.
